items.title: The Canadian – Artificial Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – 12 foot
items.summary: “The Canadian” 12ft (3.6 m) is a hooked style Christmas tree. It…
items.content_html:
“The Canadian” 12ft (3.6 m) is a hooked style Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches of three slightly varied shades of dark green which combine to make what is by far our most popular traditional style and most realistic dark green Christmas tree labelled by our customers as a “timeless classic” – suitable for use in both domestic and commercial environments. This provides a striking contrast to the bright white snow flocking.  This style Christmas tree was one of our very first two designs and has also been selected by installers across the country and used in countless commercial displays as well as consistently selected by customers who have visited our showroom.

  • Height – 12ft (3.6 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 210 cm
  • Number of Tips – 5348
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hooked (Hinged and Pre-Lit Models also available in selected sizes)
  • Colour – Dark Green and White
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Blue Spruce – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – Green – 2 foot
items.summary: “The Blue Spruce” 2ft (60 cm) is a hinged style table top…
items.content_html:
“The Blue Spruce” 2ft (60 cm) is a hinged style table top Christmas tree.  It has very sturdy but soft PE branches which make this a very pretty table top solution.

  • Height – 2ft (60 cm)
  • Width – Approximately 40 cm
  • Number of Tips – 96
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Green
  • Concrete base wrapped in burlap

items.title: Pre-lit Pine Tree Basket – Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 6.5 foot
items.summary: “The Pre-lit Pine Tree with Basket” 6.5ft (200 cm) is a hinged…
items.content_html:
“The Pre-lit Pine Tree with Basket” 6.5ft (200 cm) is a hinged style artificial Christmas tree. The Pine tree is made from a mixture of PVC and PE branches with two different tips, ranging between a dark green to a light green on the tips. The warm white LED lights are already assembled and combined with a weaved basket to bring a touch of warmth and elegance to your display. Being hinged, this tree is perfect for customers looking for a simple Christmas Tree with a quick and easy assembly.

  • Height – Approximately 6.5ft (200 cm)
  • Width – Approximately 190 cm
  • Number of Tips – 2094
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 2
  • Colour – Green
  • Lights – 300 Warm White LED Lights
  • Heavy duty green metal stand
  • Weaved basket around stand
  • Assembly instruction sheet included as well as an assembly video available here

items.title: The Austrian – Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Austrian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hooked style Christmas tree. It…
items.content_html:
“The Austrian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hooked style Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches of three shades of green varying from a light green right through to a dark green which combine to make what is our most realistic Christmas tree for those who may be used to a traditional real Australian pine Christmas tree.  This style Christmas tree was one of our very first two designs and was modelled on our fresh Christmas trees grown at Tree farm with the lighter green pine needles resembling the new shoots we see on our real Christmas trees during Christmas in the Summer time in Australia.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 140 cm
  • Number of Tips – 1585
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hooked
  • Colour – Three shades of Green from light green to dark green (Black and White Models also available in selected sizes)
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Colombian – Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – Warm White Lights – 6 foot
items.summary: “The Colombian” Pre-Lit 6ft (1.8m) is a snow flocked and hinged artificial…
items.content_html:
“The Colombian” Pre-Lit 6ft (1.8m) is a snow flocked and hinged artificial Christmas tree which has 600 warm white LED lights already attached. The LED lights have one still mode, with no flashing. It has a mixture of dark green PVC and PE branches which provide a striking contrast to the bright white snow flocking.  Being hinged and pre-lit, this Christmas tree is perfect for customers who are looking for a simply stunning Christmas tree with very little assembly.

  • Height – 6ft (1.8 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 118cm
  • Number of Tips – 2547
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Foliage – Dark Green
  • Colour – Lights – Warm White
  • Number of Lights – 600
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Swede – Artificial Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Swede” 8ft (2.4m) is a snow sprayed and hinged artificial Christmas…
items.content_html:
“The Swede” 8ft (2.4m) is a snow sprayed and hinged artificial Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC and PE branches which have been pre-decorated with a floral spray of berries and pine cones which combined with a more subtle snow spray than the usual flocking makes what our customers have called the “prettiest” Christmas tree in our range.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 140 cm
  • Number of Tips – 1996
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Green with snow spray
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Romanian – Artificial Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Romanian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a snow flocked and hinged artificial…
items.content_html:
“The Romanian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a snow flocked and hinged artificial Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC and PE branches which combine to make a stunning and very realistic impression of a tree covered in snow during Winter in the Alps.  Our customers who have visited our showroom display have nominated this Christmas tree as the top of our range.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 155 cm
  • Number of Tips – 5508
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Green with snow flock
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Austrian – Artificial Christmas Tree – White – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Austrian – White” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hooked style Christmas…
items.content_html:
“The Austrian – White” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hooked style Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches.  The different styles of white coloured branches combine to make a textured white appearance for those who are looking for a more contemporary style Christmas tree.  This Christmas tree looks stunning on its own or for those in favour of colour – it doesn’t matter which colour – it will “pop” on this very full and dense White Christmas tree.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 140 cm
  • Number of Tips – 1585
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hooked
  • Colour – White (Black and Green Models also available in selected sizes)
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Belgian – Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Belgian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hinged artificial Christmas tree with…
items.content_html:
“The Belgian” 8ft (2.4 m) is a hinged artificial Christmas tree with a mixture of dark green PVC and PE branches which combine to give a very textured realistic appearance and has proven to be popular with customers who do not want a lot of assembly with all the branches already connected to the centre pole with metal hinges.  This Christmas tree also has a slightly slimmer appearance with a smaller diameter for customers concerned about floor space.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 142 cm
  • Number of Tips – 2222
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Dark Green
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand

items.title: The Canadian – Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 8 foot
items.summary: “The Canadian” Pre-Lit 8ft (2.4 m) is a hinged style Christmas tree…
items.content_html:
“The Canadian” Pre-Lit 8ft (2.4 m) is a hinged style Christmas tree which was introduced by popular demand with 800 warm white LED lights already attached. The LED lights have one still mode, with no flashing. It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches of three slightly varied shades of dark green which combine to make what is by far our most popular traditional style and most realistic dark green Christmas tree labelled by our customers as a “timeless classic” – suitable for use in both domestic and commercial environments. Being hinged and pre-lit, this Christmas tree is perfect for customers who are looking for a Christmas tree with very little assembly.

  • Height – 8ft (2.4 metres)
  • Width – Approximately 140 cm
  • Number of Tips – 2020
  • Number of Styles of Tips – 3
  • Style of Tree – Hinged
  • Colour – Foliage – Dark Green
  • Colour – Lights – Warm White
  • Number of Lights – 800
  • Branches fall close to the ground
  • Heavy duty metal stand
